publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-5593 Cathy Jamieson: The Draft Police, Public Order and Criminal Justice (Scotland) Act 2006 (Modification of Agency’s Powers and Incidental Provision) Order 2007—That the Justice 2 Committee recommends that the draft Police, Public Order and Criminal Justice (Scotland) Act 2006 (Modification of Agency’s Powers and Incidental Provision) Order 2007 be approved. Supported by: Johann Lamont*

S2M-5593 Cathy Jamieson: The Draft Police, Public Order and Criminal Justice (Scotland) Act 2006 (Modification of Agency’s Powers and Incidental Provision) Order 2007—That the Justice 2 Committee recommends that the draft Police, Public Order and Criminal Justice (Scotland) Act 2006 (Modification of Agency’s Powers and Incidental Provision) Order 2007 be approved. Supported by: Johann Lamont
